QuestData.Title: When All Else Fails
QuestData.Description: So... so I don't think we're going to be getting a good foothold in those mountains.$B$BTrust me, I'm not one to give up easily... but between freezing engines, nasty vrykul women, territorial dragon want-to-bes and the half a dozen other nasties settled in the area, this just ain't happening.$B$BDon't let that dissuade you though! Just because we can't get a foothold doesn't mean we won't get you there... one-way trips are pretty simple when you get down to it.$B$B<Ricket nods at some nearby rockets.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Ricket to make use of Ricket's D16 Propelled Delivery Device to enter further into Storm Peaks.
QuestData.RewardText: Ow! That looked painful. It was a pretty grand entrance though, $G lad:lass;!$B$BWelcome to Frosthold! Are ya here to help us find a path into Icecrown?
